title: Clearsight Advisors Continues to Expand with New Dallas Office
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 5:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Clearsight Advisors 
DALLAS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Clearsight Advisors, Inc., an independent merchant banking firm dedicated to providing world-class M&A and capital raising solutions exclusively to growth oriented Business & Technology services companies, is pleased to announce the opening of its new Dallas, Texas office. The new location, Clearsight’s first office outside of its headquarters location in Metropolitan Washington, DC, will be led by Clearsight Managing Director, Gretchen Frary Seay. Gretchen has been with Clearsight since the beginning of the firm directing its Big Data and Analytics practice. 
“I am very pleased and excited to lead Clearsight’s expansion into Texas. Dallas is my new home and my family and I are looking forward to becoming part of the fabric of this fantastic community. We believe that Dallas is 'underbanked' and that there is a great opportunity to bring our style of advisory services to the high-growth business services and technology community in Dallas and Texas more broadly,” said Gretchen Frary Seay. Gretchen and the Dallas team will continue to work closely with the Washington office to deliver the high-level customer service and innovative financial advisory solutions to which the firm’s clients have become accustomed. 
Joel Kallett, Clearsight Managing Director and CEO said, “I’ve known and worked with Gretchen for nearly 15 years. I’m elated that she is helping to grow the firm by leading the charge in Dallas. With Dallas being the fourth largest metro area in the country and consistently ranked at the top of the lists for Best Cities for Business, Next Silicon Valley, and Top Cities for Job Growth, we could not be more thrilled to plant our first flag of expansion in the heart of this vibrant city.” 
The Dallas office is located at325 N. St Paul Street, Suite 3500 Dallas, TX 75201214-435-3502 
About Clearsight 
Clearsight Advisors is an independent merchant banking firm dedicated to providing world-class M&A and capital raising solutions exclusively to growth-oriented Business Services and Technology companies. Clearsight combines deep market insights across software, services and data. This market knowledge combined with superior strategic and financial advice allows Clearsight to act as a catalyst, enabling entrepreneurs, private equity owners and board of directors to successfully advance their vision. Clearsight Capital Advisors, Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary, is a registered member of FINRA & SIPC. For more information visit http://www.clearsightadvisors.com .
